title: Too Much Work!
description: Tiger, the house cat, dreams of being a hunter but decides it is too much work. Too Much Work! provides an opportunity for students to visualize and distinguish between reality and fantasy. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases make this book perfect for emergent readers. Illustrations support the text.
